tasks.label: Run Java code
tasks.command: if [ "${fileExtname}" = ".java" ]; then javac "${file}" && java -cp "${fileDirname}" "${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; elif [ "${fileExtname}" = ".class" ]; then java -cp "${fileDirname}" "${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; else echo 'Open a .java or .class file for Run Java task' && exit 1; fi < "${workspaceFolder}/input.txt" > "${workspaceFolder}/output.txt" 2>&1
